alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; East Polk; Lake Of The Woods; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake; Roseau; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 8:01PM CST until December 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TUESDAY TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle and light freezing rain developing tonight into Tuesday morning. Snow developing Tuesday late afternoon into Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northwest Minnesota. * WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
